name: Planet Slots - Hot Action Machine
description:
Planet Slots brings Las Vegas Casino style to your world. This 5-reel slot casino extravaganza is easy to play and features tons of bonuses and high payouts.

- Features up to 30 win lines
- Many Cool Game Themes w/great casino graphics
- Daily big win bonus!
- Bonus games and bonus spins
- No internet required to play
- Facebook Connect - Sync with iPhone & iPad

Good Luck and thanks for playing!
